item.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was fully God.

The <st data-num="3778" class="">Word</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st>.

<st data-num="3956">All things</st> were <st data-num="1096" class="">created</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5565">apart from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3761">not one thing</st> was <st data-num="1096" class="">created</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> has been <st data-num="1096" class="">created</st>.<n id="3" />
In him was life, and the life was the light of mankind.
And the light shines on in the darkness, but the darkness has not mastered it.
A man came, sent from God, whose name was John.

<st data-num="3778" class="">He</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3141" class="">witness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st><n id="3" /> might <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1565">He himself</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> he came <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>.

The <st data-num="228" class="">true</st> <st data-num="5461" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="5461" class="">gives light</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">created</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">recognize</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

He <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> what was <st data-num="2398">his own</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> his <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> people<n id="3" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> to <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> who have <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>—those who <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st><n id="1" />—he has <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">right</st> to <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>—
children not born by human parents or by human desire or a husband’s decision, but by God.
Now the Word became flesh and took up residence among us. We saw his glory—the glory of the one and only, full of grace and truth, who came from the Father.

<st data-num="2491" class="">John</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted out</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="3778" class="">This one</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> the one about <st data-num="3739">whom</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, ‘He who <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">greater</st> than <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">existed</st> <st data-num="4413">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me.’</st>”

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4138" class="">fullness</st> one <st data-num="5485">gracious gift</st> <st data-num="473">after</st> <st data-num="5485">another</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> was <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="1096">came about</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.
No one has ever seen God. The only one, himself God, who is in closest fellowship with the Father, has made God known.
Now this was John’s testimony when the Jewish leaders sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him, “Who are you?”

He <st data-num="3670" class="">confessed</st>—he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="720" class="">deny</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3670" class="">confessed</st>—“<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>!”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> you <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>?” He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>!”<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">Prophet</st>?”<n id="3" /> He <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="3756" class="">No</st>!”
Then they said to him, “Who are you? Tell us so that we can give an answer to those who sent us. What do you say about yourself?”
John said, “I am the voice of one shouting in the wilderness, ‘Make straight the way for the Lord,’ as the prophet Isaiah said.”

(<st data-num="2532">Now</st> they had <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st>.<n id="1" />)<n id="2" />
So they asked John, “Why then are you baptizing if you are not the Christ, nor Elijah, nor the Prophet?”
John answered them, “I baptize with water. Among you stands one whom you do not recognize,

who is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">untie</st> the <st data-num="2438" class="">strap</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5266" class="">sandal</st>!”
These things happened in Bethany across the Jordan River where John was baptizing.
On the next day John saw Jesus coming toward him and said, “Look, the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world!

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the one <st data-num="5228" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="3694">After</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">greater</st> than <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="1510">existed</st> <st data-num="4413">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me.’</st>
I did not recognize him, but I came baptizing with water so that he could be revealed to Israel.”
Then John testified, “I saw the Spirit descending like a dove from heaven, and it remained on him.

<st data-num="2504">And I</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">recognize</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="1565" class="">one</st> who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="907" class="">baptize</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, ‘The <st data-num="1565" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">remaining</st>—<st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the one who <st data-num="907" class="">baptizes</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit.’</st>
I have both seen and testified that this man is the Chosen One of God.”
Again the next day John was standing there with two of his disciples.

<st data-num="1689">Gazing at</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> as he <st data-num="4043">walked by</st>, he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2396">Look</st>, the <st data-num="286" class="">Lamb</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!”<n id="1" />

When <st data-num="846" class="">John’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> him <st data-num="2980" class="">say</st> this,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4762">turned around</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2300" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="190" class="">following</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> do you <st data-num="2212" class="">want</st>?”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>” (<st data-num="3739">which</st> is <st data-num="3177" class="">translated</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">Teacher)</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="4226">where</st> are you <st data-num="3306" class="">staying</st>?”
Jesus answered, “Come and you will see.” So they came and saw where he was staying, and they stayed with him that day. Now it was about four o’clock in the afternoon.
Andrew, the brother of Simon Peter, was one of the two disciples who heard what John said and followed Jesus.

<st data-num="3778" class="">He</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “We have <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> the <st data-num="3323" class="">Messiah</st>!”<n id="2" /> (<st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3177" class="">translated</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ)</st>.<n id="3" />
Andrew brought Simon to Jesus. Jesus looked at him and said, “You are Simon, the son of John. You will be called Cephas” (which is translated Peter).
On the next day Jesus wanted to set out for Galilee. He found Philip and said to him, “Follow me.”

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="966" class="">Bethsaida</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> of<n id="2" /> <st data-num="406" class="">Andrew</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4074">Peter</st>.)

<st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="3482" class="">Nathanael</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “We have <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> the <st data-num="3739" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> about <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> also<n id="2" /> wrote about—<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3478" class="">Nazareth</st>, the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>.”
Nathanael replied, “Can anything good come out of Nazareth?” Philip replied, “Come and see.”
Jesus saw Nathanael coming toward him and exclaimed, “Look, a true Israelite in whom there is no deceit!”

<st data-num="3482" class="">Nathanael</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4159">How</st> do you <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?” <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4253">Before</st> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, when you <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="4808">fig tree</st>,<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

<st data-num="3482" class="">Nathanael</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4461">Rabbi</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God;</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>!”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3754" class="">Because</st> I <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5270" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="4808">fig tree</st>, do you <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>? You will <st data-num="3708" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st> things than <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st>.”<n id="2" />
He continued, “I tell all of you the solemn truth—you will see heaven opened and the angels of God ascending and descending on the Son of Man.”
